## Globus - Fast secure and accurate file transfers

Recent convert to Globus

Alternatives;

+ SCP - deprecated due to security
+ rsync - complicated syntax, no encryption, no confirmation or emails.


SDK/API also available [https://globus-sdk-python.readthedocs.io/en/stable/](https://globus-sdk-python.readthedocs.io/en/stable/)
